name: eCSStender
author: St√©phane Goetz

sections.description:
This plugin uses the eCSStender javascript Library. This library is a parser that takes your CSS after the browser.

The library re-interprets the css using the plugins and adds new abilities to the browsers. You can for example add CSS3 Selectors support to IE6.

It will be less a Pain to develop a theme for IE6 or other browsers now.
sections.installation:
1. Extract the archive
  2. upload the directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  3. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  4. Enable the needed plugins
  5. Enjoy !
sections.changelog:
Roadmap

  • Enable Theme’s plugins.

0.1

  • Enables adding plugins to a specified folder
  • Enables to add dependencies to the scripts

short_description: Extend the functionalities of CSS by adding plugins to eCSStender
